tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE music_therapy_sessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  session_date DATE,
  session_time TIME,
  therapy_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE therapists (
    therapist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    therapist_name VARCHAR(50),
    specialty VARCHAR(50),
    availability BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE therapists (
  therapist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_name VARCHAR(50),
  specialty VARCHAR(50),
  availability INT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  date DATE,
  time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE therapist (
  therapist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_name VARCHAR,
  therapist_specialty VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE patient (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR,
  patient_age INT
)

CREATE TABLE session (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE availability (
  therapist_id INT,
  day INT,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME,
  PRIMARY KEY (therapist_id, day)
)

CREATE TABLE session (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    therapist_id INT REFERENCES therapist(therapist_id),
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patient(patient_id),
    session_date DATE,
    session_time TIME
);
